channel.title: WebDevelopment on Blog

item.title: How I Made My Portfolio Website
item.description: As a software engineering student, having a portfolio website is essential. It’s a way to showcase your skills, projects, and experiences to potential employers and collaborators. In this blog post, I’ll walk you through the process of how I created my portfolio website. Introduction and Motivation Creating a portfolio website is a must for every software engineering student. It serves as a platform to display your work, share your knowledge through a blog, and provide a way for people to contact you.
